mapper.select: select store_tbl.id,store_tbl.product_id as 'productID',store_tbl.total,store_tbl.remark,store_tbl.update_date as 'updateDate', product_tbl.name as 'productName',product_tbl.spec as 'productSpec' from store_tbl,product_tbl where product_tbl.id=store_tbl.product_id order by product_tbl.id
